statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_invoices
SELECT invoice_number, supplier_name FROM supplier_invoices
SELECT * FROM supplier_invoices WHERE invoice_amount > 1000
SELECT supplier_name, invoice_amount FROM supplier_invoices WHERE payment_status = TRUE
SELECT invoice_id, supplier_name FROM supplier_invoices ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT * FROM supplier_invoices WHERE invoice_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_number DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, invoice_amount FROM supplier_invoices WHERE payment_status = TRUE ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, invoice_amount DESC;
SELECT invoice_number, supplier_name, invoice_amount FROM supplier_invoices WHERE invoice_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY invoice_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_invoices WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' AND payment_status = FALSE;
SELECT invoice_id, supplier_name, invoice_amount FROM supplier_invoices WHERE invoice_amount > 500 AND supplier_name IN ('Supplier1', 'Supplier2') ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, invoice_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_invoices;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_number, amount FROM supplier_invoices WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date FROM supplier_invoices WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_records ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM payment_records WHERE payment_status = 'Complete';
SELECT * FROM supplier_invoices WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC, invoice_number ASC
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_number, invoice_date, amount FROM supplier_invoices WHERE supplier_id = 100 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT invoice_number, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM supplier_invoices GROUP BY invoice_number HAVING total_amount > 10000
SELECT si.invoice_number, pr.payment_date, pr.payment_amount, pr.payment_method FROM supplier_invoices si JOIN payment_records pr ON si.invoice_id = pr.invoice_id ORDER BY pr.payment_date ASC

SELECT si.invoice_number, pr.payment_date, pr.payment_amount, pr.payment_method FROM supplier_invoices si LEFT JOIN payment_records pr ON si.invoice_id = pr.invoice_id WHERE pr.payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY pr.payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM supplier_invoices;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_number, total_amount FROM supplier_invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number = '+123456789';
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM supplier_invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM supplier_invoices GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC, total_amount DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(si.invoice_id) AS num_invoices FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN supplier_invoices si ON s.supplier_id = si.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name HAVING num_invoices > 5 ORDER BY num_invoices DESC;

SELECT si.invoice_number, s.supplier_name, p.amount_paid FROM supplier_invoices si JOIN payments p ON si.invoice_id = p.invoice_id JOIN suppliers s ON si.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE p.amount_paid >= 500 ORDER BY p.amount_paid DESC;
SELECT si.invoice_id, si.total_amount, p.amount_paid FROM supplier_invoices si LEFT JOIN payments p ON si.invoice_id = p.invoice_id WHERE p.invoice_id IS NULL OR si.total_amount > 1000;

SELECT si.*, p.amount_paid, s.supplier_name FROM supplier_invoices si JOIN payments p ON si.invoice_id = p.invoice_id JOIN suppliers s ON si.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE si.invoice_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM supplier_invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM supplier_invoices WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM supplier_invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_details JOIN supplier_invoices ON payment_details.invoice_id = supplier_invoices.invoice_id;
SELECT invoice_id, supplier_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM supplier_invoices WHERE supplier_id = 1001;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, invoice_date, total_amount FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN supplier_invoices i ON s.supplier_id = i.supplier_id WHERE s.supplier_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT s.supplier_name, SUM(p.payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM suppliers s LEFT JOIN payment_details p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name;
SELECT s.*, ps.status_description FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN payment_statuses ps ON s.status_id = ps.status_id WHERE s.supplier_id = 2002;
SELECT * FROM supplier_invoices
SELECT invoice_id, amount, invoice_date FROM supplier_invoices
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT invoice_id, log_description FROM invoice_logs WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT supplier_name, address, contact_person FROM suppliers JOIN supplier_payments ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplier_payments.supplier_id
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT invoice_id, amount, invoice_date FROM supplier_invoices WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, address, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM supplier_payments WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT log_description, log_date FROM invoice_logs WHERE invoice_id = 5 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
